sentences.en: Having just moved from South Africa, he was storing his polo gear in one of our units.
sentences.cn: 他刚从南非般到此地， 要将他的马球工具储存在我们的一个单元里。

sentences.en: He has lived and breathed polo since he was seven.
sentences.cn: 他从7岁开始就一直热衷于马球。

sentences.en: In 40 years, the Guards' Polo Club has changed, but it has managed to keep most of the rabble out.
sentences.cn: 40年间，御林军马球俱乐部虽有变化，但却一直成功地把绝大多数下层民众拒之门外。

sentences.en: Marco Polo is said to have sailed on the Pacific on his way to Java in the thirteenth century.
sentences.cn: 据说，13世纪时，马可·波罗在去爪哇岛的途中在太平洋上航行过。

sentences.en: Marco Polo traveled all around the Silk Road.
Marco Polo was born in Venice in 1254.
sentences.cn: 马可-波罗1254年生于威尼斯.

sentences.en: Marco Polo's travelogue mentions that Kublai Khan sent envoys to Malgache.
sentences.cn: 马可波罗游记中提到忽必烈曾派使节到马尔加什.

sentences.en: Off work , Mr. Segal wore only khaki pants and blue polo shirts for years.
sentences.cn: 多少年来,西加尔下班后只穿卡其布裤子和蓝色polo衬衫.

sentences.en: Polo players use long sticks to hit the wooden ball through the other team's goal.
sentences.cn: 打马球的人用长棍把木球打进对方的球门.

sentences.en: Prince Charles is a keen polo player.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯王子是个喜欢打马球的人.

sentences.en: The best title of the passage is Marco Polo.
sentences.cn: 本文的最佳题目是马可波罗.

sentences.en: The publication of Marco Polo's travels produced a profound effect upon the European imagination.
sentences.cn: 马可-波罗游记的出版对欧洲人的想象力产生了深刻影响.

sentences.en: This water polo team is a strong one.
We watched a wonderful polo match.
sentences.cn: 我们看了一场精彩的马球比赛.

sentences.en: Yes. And also a water polo match.
sentences.cn: 是的.还有一场水球比赛.

sentences.en: You can wear a polo neck with that jacket.
sentences.cn: 你可以穿件高圆翻领衫配那件外衣。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 马可波罗（意大利旅行家）

trans.tran_en: a game played between two teams of players who ride on horses and hit a small ball with long-handled wooden hammers
